Package main.controllers

Class MovieController

java.lang.Object
main.controllers.Controller
main.controllers.MovieController
public class MovieController extends Controller
This class manages user actions pertaining to the Movie class. Stores a list of all movies.
Since:
2022-11-08
Version:
1.0
Author:
Tai Chen An

  • Method Details

    • listMovies

      public static void listMovies(boolean admin)
      Calls MovieList to display all movies in the stored list.
      Parameters:
      admin - indicates if user is an admin or movie-goer.

    • rankMovies

      public static void rankMovies(boolean ticketSales, boolean admin)
      This method is called when user requests to display top 5 movies by ticket sales or reviewer ratings. The list of movies is first sorted by a priority queue. The front five elements are then added into a list and passed to MovieRanking.
      Parameters:
      ticketSales - indicates if movies are to be ranked by ticket sales or reviewer ratings.
      admin - indicates if user is an admin or movie-goer.

    • searchMovies

      public static void searchMovies()
      This method is called when user requests to search for a movie. A list of movies containing the input string is passed to MovieList. If not, returns to
      invalid @link 
      MainMenu
      .

    • searchMovie

      Returns:
      Movie containing the given string.
